This Website contains a paper written for a course on Data Science for
Industry, the paper is include in the Page named "Main Assignment". The
main objective of the project is to fit at least three predictive models
that take a sentence of text as input and return a prediction of which
president was the source of that sentence. The following models are
compared:

-   neural networks

-   decision trees

-   random forests
